channel.title: [Pi] Magebook Teles [Pi]
channel.description: Whenever i try to teleport for example [Rock Crabs] it teleports me home . Every teleport, teleports me home . Please help me

item.title: [Pi] Magebook Teles [Pi]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Wow… So the problem was a lot simpler than I thought…

All of your teleports are set to the same coords :palm: :palm:

These are your cases for each of the buttons…

[code=java] case 9190:// 5 option interface - first option
if (c.teleAction == 1)
c.getPA().spellTeleport(3088, 3495, 0);// Rock Crabs
else if (c.teleAction == 2)
c.getPA().spellTeleport(3088, 3495, 0);// Barrows
else if (c.teleAction == 3)
c.getPA().spellTeleport(3088, 3495, 0);// Godwars
else if (c.teleAction == 4)
c.getPA().spellTeleport(3088, 3495, 0);// Varrock
else if (c.teleAction == 5)
c.getPA().spellTeleport(3088, 3495,0);// ??
else if (c.teleAction == 20)
c.getPA().spellTeleport(3222, 3218, 0);// ??

			if (c.dialogueAction == 10) {
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(3088, 3495, 0);// ??
				c.dialogueAction = -1;
			} else if (c.dialogueAction == 11) {
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(3088, 3495, 0);// ??
				c.dialogueAction = -1;
			} else if (c.dialogueAction == 12) {
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(3088, 3495, 0);// ??
				c.dialogueAction = -1;
			}
			break;
		//mining - 3046,9779,0
		//smithing - 3079,9502,0
			
		case 9191:// 5 option interface - second option
			if (c.teleAction == 1)
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(3088, 3495, 0);// Tavelry Dungeon
			else if (c.teleAction == 2)
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(2657, 2639, 0);// Pest Control
			else if (c.teleAction == 3)
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(3088, 3495, 0);// KBD
			else if (c.teleAction == 4)
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(3088, 3495, 0);// Graveyard
			else if (c.teleAction == 5)
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(3088, 3495, 0);// ??
			else if (c.teleAction == 20)// 3210 3424
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(3088, 3495, 0);// ??
				
			if (c.dialogueAction == 10) {
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(3088, 3495, 0);// ??
				c.dialogueAction = -1;
			} else if (c.dialogueAction == 11) {
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(3088, 3495, 0);// ??
				c.dialogueAction = -1;
			} else if (c.dialogueAction == 12) {
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(3088, 3495, 0);// ??
				c.dialogueAction = -1;
			}
			break;
			
		case 9192:// 5 option interface - third option
			if (c.teleAction == 1)
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(3088, 3495, 0);// Slayer Tower
			else if (c.teleAction == 2) {
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(3088, 3495, 0);// Tzhaar
				c.sendMessage("To fight Jad, enter the cave.");
			} else if (c.teleAction == 3) {
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(3088, 3495, 0);// Dag kings
				c.sendMessage("Climb down the ladder to get into the lair.");
			} else if (c.teleAction == 4)
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(3351, 3659, 0);// Hill Giants
			else if (c.teleAction == 5)
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(3088, 3495,0);// ??
			else if (c.teleAction == 20)
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(2757,3477,0);// ??

			if (c.dialogueAction == 10) {
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(2713, 4836, 0);// ??
				c.dialogueAction = -1;
			} else if (c.dialogueAction == 11) {
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(2162, 4833, 0);// ??
				c.dialogueAction = -1;
			} else if (c.dialogueAction == 12) {
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(2207, 4836, 0);// ??
				c.dialogueAction = -1;
			}
			break;
			
		case 9193:// 5 option interface - fourth option
			if (c.teleAction == 1)
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(3088, 3495, 0);// Brimhaven Dungeon
			else if (c.teleAction == 2)
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(3088, 3495, 0);// Duel Arena
			else if (c.teleAction == 3)
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(3088, 3495, 0);// Chaos Elemental
			else if (c.teleAction == 4)
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(2964, 3378, 0);// Falador
			else if (c.teleAction == 5) {
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(3088, 3495, 0);// Woodcutting?
				c.sendMessage("For magic logs, try north of the duel arena.");
			} else if (c.teleAction == 20)
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(3088, 3495,0);
			
			if (c.dialogueAction == 10) {
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(3088, 3495, 0);// ??
				c.dialogueAction = -1;
			} else if (c.dialogueAction == 11) {
				c.getRunecrafting().craftRunes(2489);// Crafting astral runes
				c.dialogueAction = -1;
			} else if (c.dialogueAction == 12) {
				c.getRunecrafting().craftRunes(2489);// Crafting bloods
				c.dialogueAction = -1;
			}
			break;
			
		case 9194:// 5 option interface - fifth option
			if (c.teleAction == 1)
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(3088, 3495, 0);// Island
			else if (c.teleAction == 2) {
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(3088, 3495, 0);// Assault
				c.sendMessage("Get Gloves + fighter torso here");
			} else if (c.teleAction == 4)
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(3088, 3495, 0);// Ardy lever
			else if (c.teleAction == 5)
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(3088, 3495, 0);// ??
			else if (c.teleAction == 20)
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(3506,3496,0);// ??
				
			if (c.dialogueAction == 10 || c.dialogueAction == 11) {
				c.dialogueId++;
				c.getDH().sendDialogues(c.dialogueId, 0);// Sending new dialogues
			} else if (c.dialogueAction == 12) {
				c.dialogueId = 17;
				c.getDH().sendDialogues(c.dialogueId, 0);// Sending new dialogues
			}
			break;[/code]

All I did was make it look a bit better (imo)
I added comments to just about all teleports. They’re there to help you keep track of what each teleport is.

You need to change the coords from your home coords (3088, 3495, 0) in basically everything.

Read full topic

item.title: [Pi] Magebook Teles [Pi]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

jSiK:

I will post it When I get home , and I click the teleport and then it has a dialogue list of rock crabs etc.

In that case. I’m thinking one of two possibilities. You’re missing a “break;” somewhere, or you’re id’s are off. We’ll see when you show the code.

Read full topic

item.title: [Pi] Magebook Teles [Pi]

item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

jSiK:

Whenever i try to teleport for example [Rock Crabs] it teleports me home . Every teleport, teleports me home . Please help me

Post your ClickingButtons.java and your PlayerAssistant.java.
Use http://pastebin.com because they’ll be over the character limit.
And do you just click the spell button and then teleport, or do you click a dialogue?
